About Me

Aliquam ut ex ut interdum donec amet imperdiet eleifend

Brief Intro

I am an Undergraduate pursuing B.Tech in Electrical Engineering at the prestigious Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee (IITR)
You can find my resume Here .

Also , I am an Developer, basically into Android Development , but also I have been exploring other areas such as Machine Learning , CNN, Chatbots etc lately. As an active member of Mobile Development Group - IIT Roorkee , I have developed a few apps , and one of them is on Google Playstore. You can find it here : Citadel

Apart from that, I am also a member of BookShelf IIT-R , a book reading society , that promotes reading culture in the campus.

What about my name ?
